pages.text: Modifiers affecting the player's items on death$(br)$(li)$(l)Afterlife$()$(li2)All items you entered with and collected inside will be restored upon death. $(li2)Artifacts can be found $(li2)Experience multiplier x0.5$(li)$(l)Phoenix$() $(li2)Ressurects the player upon death like a Totem of Undying $(li2)Can be stacked on a crystal

$(li)$(l)Beginners Grace$() $(li2)Automatically applies to Vault level 0-20 $(li2)All items you entered with and collected inside will be restored upon death. $(li2)No experience on death$(br2)$(l)Note:$() if you add a seal or catalyst, Beginners Grace will not be applied. $(br)$(l)Note:$() dying with item restoration will cause a penalty of gear durability, except if you are 21 levels above the Vault's level.
